thread.title: 15 Makeup Dupes That've Actually Been Tried Approved By Beauty Addicts
thread.title_full: 15 Makeup Dupes That've Actually Been Tried And Approved By Beauty Addicts

author: Essence Gant
title: 15 Makeup Dupes That've Actually Been Tried Approved By Beauty Addicts

organizations.name: klean color madly matte metallic lipgloss

text:
View this image ›
kyliecosmetics.com / jordanacosmetics.com The beauty vlogger dishes that the shades are “exactly the same.” Get Jordana Sweet Cream Matte here for only $4.99.
Savings: $12.01
ID: 10473443 2. You honestly can’t tell the difference between the Elf Moonlight Pearls and The Balm Mary-Lou Manizer highlighters. View this image ›
instagram.com See how close these highlighter swatches are here . Get Elf’s Baked Highlighter in Moonlight Pearls here for $4.
Savings: $20
ID: 10475263 3. Why pay so much for Chanel’s Bronzing Makeup Base when you can get the same look with Colour Pop’s Bronzer ? View this image ›
chanel.com / colourpop.com Listen to what this makeup guru has to say about the dupe. Try Colour Pop bronzers for $8.
Savings: $42
ID: 10460320 4. Klean Color’s gold gloss is just as awesome as Lime Crime’s , and it’s way cheaper! View this image ›
limecrime.com / beautyjoint.com See swatches here , and get Klean Color Madly Matte Metallic Lipgloss in Marigold here for $1.99
Savings: $18.01
ID: 10475881 5. Rio by Anastasia Beverly Hills is great, but so is Kiss Me by Morphe . View this image ›
sephora.com / morphebrushes.com See them side-by-side in this blog . Try Morphe Creme Lip Polish in Kiss Me for $4.99.
Savings: $11.01
ID: 10476495 6. These Artis brushes are pricey as hell, but this Moda kit is said to be very similar and it costs waaay less money. View this image ›
artisbrush.com / beautyusa.royalbrush.com This makeup guru puts the dupe to the test and loves it! The Moda Prismatic brushes are $24.99.
Savings: $145.01
ID: 10427565 7. This Kiss eyeshadow primer by Ruby Kisses gets the job done, but for less than this Urban Decay primer . View this image ›
amazon.com / amazon.com Watch this YouTube vlogger compare both primers. Get Ruby Kisses 24 HR Eyeshadow Magic Primer for $8.49.
Savings: $11.51
ID: 10474013 8. So it’s not an exact dupe, but the Maybelline FaceStudio Master Contour is pretty darn close to this Japonesque palette . View this image ›
ulta.com / ulta.com Here you can see how they’re different, but not different enough to pay triple the price. Maybelline FaceStudio Master Contour is only $12.99.
Savings: $27.01
ID: 10459837 9. Too Faced lipstick in Peony and Maybelline in Never Bare are basically the exact same! View this image ›
ulta.com / ulta.com Look at how close they are here . Try Maybelline’s Never Bare for $9.99.
Savings: $11.01
ID: 10459958 10. Both of these full coverage foundations are a little pricey, but Estee Lauder’s is about $15 less than Marc Jacobs’ . View this image ›
sephora.com / sephora.com Watch this makeup guru compare both. Try Estee Lauder’s Double Wear Stay-in-Place Makeup for $39.50.
Savings: $15.50
ID: 10473910 11. Kiko Light Gold Water Eyeshadow is half the price of this Anastasia Beverly Hills Illuminator . View this image ›
anastasiabeverlyhills.com / kikocosmetics.com This Instagram account compares swatches from both, and they look identical. Here’s the Kiko Light Gold Water Eyeshadow for $14, and you can use it as a shadow or highlight!
Savings: $14
ID: 10427118 12. Might as well go with this L’Oreal primer because it’s basically the same as this Tarte one . View this image ›
sephora.com / ulta.com This vlogger says she can’t tell them apart besides the packaging. Get L’Oreal Studio Secrets Magic Perfecting Base for $12.99.
Savings: $26.01
ID: 10459755 13. Urban Decay’s Heavy Metal Glitter Eyeliners are super fun, but Revlon PhotoReady Eye Art is a great dupe. View this image ›
ulta.com / ulta.com This beauty found that Revlon PhotoReady Eye Art was basically the same as Urban Decay’s glitter liner, and it’s only $8.99.
Savings: $11.01
ID: 10460392 14. Some beauty addicts even like NYX Mineral Matte Finishing Powder better than Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder ! View this image ›
sephora.com / ulta.com This Laura Mercier devotee was converted to NYX after testing the dupe version. Get NYX Matte “Set It & Don’t Fret It” Finishing Powder for $9.99.
Savings: $28.01
ID: 10460072 15. Kiko’s Radiant Touch Highlighter is pretty comparable to Benefit’s Watt’s Up , but it’s not as hard on the coins. View this image ›
ulta.com / kikocosmetics.com Here are swatches to see for yourself. Kiko’s Radiant Touch Highlighter is $14.
Savings: $16
ID: 10426925 NOW GO BALL OUT ON SOME MAKEUP! View this image ›
ABC / Via giphy.com ID: 10482011
